CustomField.description: No. of days tier dependent on the job role's verified date
CustomField.formula: IF(TODAY() - Verification_Date__c <= 90, "01 - 0 - 90 days", IF(TODAY() - Verification_Date__c <= 180, "02 - 91 - 180 days", IF(TODAY() - Verification_Date__c <= 364, "03 - 180 - 364 days", IF(TODAY() - Verification_Date__c >= 365, "04 - 365+ days", "Unverified" ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: No. of days tier dependent on the job role's verified date
CustomField.label: Last Verification Date Tier
